entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
